hero.title: Affordable Independent Houses for Sale in Sector 66 Gurugram
description: Sector 66 Gurugram is a premium yet well-balanced residential locality located along Golf Course Extension Road, offering excellent connectivity and modern infrastructure. The area is surrounded by reputed residential projects, corporate offices, schools, hospitals, and shopping complexes, making it highly convenient for daily living. Buyers searching for an affordable house for sale in Sector 66 Gurugram prefer this location due to its smooth road connectivity to Sohna Road, NH-48, and major business hubs of Gurugram. The sector also offers green surroundings, planned roads, and a safe residential environment.

Affordable houses for sale in Sector 66 Gurugram provide a rare opportunity to enjoy independent living in a well-developed and high-demand area. With strong rental demand, quality infrastructure, and consistent price appreciation, Sector 66 is suitable for both end-users and investors.
